free_recipes: BobTA Northern Soul Spin On Floor
BobTA Salsa Double Twirl and Clap

lang.UI_profdesc_animalcontrolofficer:
Knows all trap recipes.
Can find items more often in Search Mode.
lang.UI_profdesc_botanist:
Proficient in Herbalism.
Can find items much more often in Search Mode.
lang.UI_profdesc_campcouns:
Knows how to make and fix a fishing rod, how to get the wire back.
Can find items much more often in Search Mode.
lang.UI_profdesc_chef:
Knows how to make dough for cake, pie, bread and pizza.
Can find items more often in Search Mode.
lang.UI_profdesc_cleanerman: Can find items more often in Search Mode.
lang.UI_profdesc_detective: Can find items much more often in Search Mode.
lang.UI_profdesc_dragracerocc: Prefers to drive at high speeds.
lang.UI_profdesc_electrician:
Can operate generators.
Knows how to make remote controllers, remote triggers, timers and makeshift radios.
lang.UI_profdesc_engineer:
Can make trap and explosives.
Knows how to make different bombs and noise generators.
lang.UI_profdesc_farmer:
Knows how to make sprays to cure plant diseases.
Can find items more often in Search Mode.
lang.UI_profdesc_fisherman:
Knows how to make and fix a fishing rod, how to get the wire back, and how to make a fishing net.
Can find items more often in Search Mode.
lang.UI_profdesc_graveman: Can find items more often in Search Mode.
lang.UI_profdesc_junkyardworker:
Knows some metalworking recipes.
Can find items much more often in Search Mode.
lang.UI_profdesc_lumberjack:
Allows slightly faster movement through forests and woodland.
Can find items more often in Search Mode.
lang.UI_profdesc_metalworker:
Can weld foraged metals to create items and barricades.
Knows all metalworking recipes.
lang.UI_profdesc_parkranger:
Allows much faster movement through forests and woodland.
Knows all trap recipes.
Can find items much more often in Search Mode.
lang.UI_profdesc_soldier: Can find items more often in Search Mode.
lang.UI_profdesc_veteran: Can find items more often in Search Mode.
lang.UI_trait_AllThumbsDesc2:
Transfers inventory items slowly.
(+100% inventory transferring time.)
lang.UI_trait_BarFighterDesc2:
Used to getting in trouble.
Successful attacks in melee have a chance to reduce unhappiness.
lang.UI_trait_DexterousDesc2:
Transfers inventory items quickly.
(-50% inventory transferring time.)
lang.UI_trait_Gymnast2desc: Has skills in Nimble and Lightfooted.
lang.UI_trait_Hemophobic2Desc:
Panic when performing first aid on self and butchering animals.	
Cannot perform first aid on others.
Gets stressed and unhappy when covered in blood.
lang.UI_trait_Mechanics2Desc: Knows how to service and repair all types of vehicles.
lang.UI_trait_MechanicsDesc: Knows how to service and repair standard and heavy vehicles.
lang.UI_trait_SOHikerDesc:
Experienced in hiking long distances.
(Reduced accumulation of hunger, thirst and fatigue if walking for a while without stopping.
Knows how to make Snare Trap, a Stick Trap and Wooden Cage Trap.)
lang.UI_trait_SOSmokerDesc:
Has a tobacco addiction.
Slightly increased endurance loss while running or fighting.
May cough when exhausted.
Tobacco smoking reduces stress, unhappiness and hunger.
Abstaining from smoking increases stress, unhappiness and hunger.
(Can get rid of this bad habit if do not smoke tobacco for a month.)
lang.UI_trait_Scout2Desc: Has skills in First Aid and Foraging.
lang.UI_trait_accmetabolismdesc:
Trains Strength and Fitness faster if not hungry.
Prone to maintain ideal weight.
(+30% Strength and Fitness XP if hunger level not higher than Peckish,
-30% calorie burn if weight is less than 76,
+30% calorie burn if weight is over than 84.)
lang.UI_trait_allergicdesc:
Sneezes involuntary from time to time.
(May attract zombies.
Sneeze can be muffled with Tissue or Toilet paper.)
lang.UI_trait_bladetoolsdesc:
More effective with blade weapons.
(Using Short Blades gains 15% additional XP for Long Blades and vice versa.)
lang.UI_trait_breathingtechdesc:
Increased endurance recovery while not moving.
(More effective if sitting on the ground.)
lang.UI_trait_commdriverdesc:
Reduced fatigue gain when driving a moving vehicle.
Able to repair heavy vehicles.
lang.UI_trait_crueltydesc:
More effective with weapons.
(+25% XP for all weapon skills, Maintenance skill and Aiming skill.)
lang.UI_trait_demostronggripdesc:
Can use Sledgehammer more effectively in combat.
(Sledgehammer swings faster and cost less endurance.)
lang.UI_trait_depressivemooddesc:
Often sad. May become depressed for no reason.
Bad mood can affect productivity.
(Unhappiness builds up over time.
Sudden depression may occur once every few days.
Reduces XP gain in all skills depending on
Unhappiness moodle, up to -10%.)
lang.UI_trait_ectomorphdesc:
Trains Fitness faster, but trains Strength slower.
Prone to lose weight.
(+30% Fitness XP, -30% Strength XP,
+30% calorie burn if weight is over than 70.)
lang.UI_trait_endomorphdesc:
Trains Strength faster, but trains Fitness slower.
Prone to gain weight.
(+30% Strength XP, -30% Fitness XP,
-30% calorie burn if weight is less than 90.)
lang.UI_trait_enjoytheridedesc:
Driving at high speed reduces Stress and Unhappiness.
Able to repair sport vehicles.
(Vehicle speed must be over 60 MPH.)
lang.UI_trait_entomologistdesc: Increased chance to find insects in Search mode.
lang.UI_trait_fearofthedarkdesc:
Fear of the dark. Gets panicked without light sources.
Being in the dark for a long time also increases stress.
lang.UI_trait_fragilehealthdesc:
Trains Strength and Fitness slower.
Carrying too much may cause health problems.
(-30% Strength and Fitness XP,
Heavy Load moodle gradually reduces health to 50%.)
lang.UI_trait_gasmanagementdesc:
Transfers inventory items, refuels vehicles and drains gasoline faster.
(-25% inventory transferring time, refueling vehicles and draining gasoline.
Up to -60% inventory transferring time with \"Dextrous\" trait.)
lang.UI_trait_genexpdesc:
Knows how to operate and repair generators.
(Repairing a generator increases its condition by an additional 5%.)
lang.UI_trait_highsweatydesc:
Increases wetness generated.
(Sweating increases during combat, running or doing fitness.)
lang.UI_trait_improvisedcleaningdesc:
Can make improvised cleaning supplies.
(Knows how to make Bleach and Cleaning Liquid.)
lang.UI_trait_larkpersondesc:
Prefers to be awake in the morning.
(Fatigue accumulates more slowly in the morning (05:00 a.m. - 10:00 a.m.),
but faster in the evening (05:00 p.m. - 10:00 p.m.)).
lang.UI_trait_lesssweatydesc:
Reduces wetness generated.
(May be less effective while under rain.)
lang.UI_trait_lifelonglearnerdesc: Does not get bored while reading educational literature.
lang.UI_trait_liquidblooddesc:
Wounds bleed more.
(+100% damage from bleeding.)
lang.UI_trait_marathonrunnerdesc:
Increased endurance recovery while running or sprinting.
(Does not affect running while sneaking.)
lang.UI_trait_mesomorphdesc: Average body type with no pros or cons.
lang.UI_trait_minersendurancedesc:
Can use Pickaxe more effectively in combat.
(Pickaxe swings faster and cost less endurance.)
lang.UI_trait_mushroompickerdesc: Increased chance to find mushrooms in Search mode.
lang.UI_trait_ninjawaydesc:
Increased endurance recovery while sneaking.
(More effective if running or not moving while sneaking.)
lang.UI_trait_optimistmooddesc:
Less bored. May not be depressed for a long time.
(-50% passive boredom generation.
Unhappiness can't get higher than 50% for 48 hours.)
lang.UI_trait_owlpersondesc:
Prefers to stay awake in the evenings.
(Fatigue accumulates more slowly in the evening (05:00 p.m. - 10:00 p.m.),
but faster in the morning (05:00 a.m. - 10:00 a.m.)).
lang.UI_trait_panicattacksdesc:
Suffering from sudden panic attacks.
Any panic passes more slowly.
(May wake up from a panic attack.
Panic attacks become less frequent with survived time.)
lang.UI_trait_priestspiritdesc:
Can write prayers to improve mental state.
(Prayers slightly reduce stress, boredom and unhappiness.)
lang.UI_trait_pronetoillness2desc:
More prone to disease. May accidentally catch a cold.
Faster rate of zombification.
(+25% zombification speed, +70% chance of catching a cold,
+20% cold strength, +50% cold progression speed,
has a negligible chance of catching a cold while outside.)
lang.UI_trait_relentlessdesc:
Can recover endurance when swinging a weapon.
(Has a chance to restore half of the weapon's base swing cost.)
lang.UI_trait_sensitivedigestiondesc:
Experiencing pain in the stomach and nausea when overeating.
(The larger the portion, the stronger the pain and nausea can be.)
lang.UI_trait_shooter2desc: Has skills in Aiming and Reloading.
lang.UI_trait_snorerdesc:
Snoring loudly while sleeping.
(May attract zombies while sleeping.)
lang.UI_trait_soalcoholicdesc:
Has an alcohol addiction.
Drinking alcohol does not cause fatigue.
Abstinence from alcohol increases stress, unhappiness and thirst.
Prolonged abstinence increases fatigue, headache and nausea.
(Can get rid of this bad habit if do not drink alcohol for a month and a half.)
lang.UI_trait_sorelegsdesc:
Experiencing pain in the legs when walking, running, sprinting, doing fitness and stomping.
While sprinting, the pain and endurance consumption is much higher.
(Sprinting level reducing pain while running and sprinting.
Lightfooted level reducing walking and stomping pain.)
lang.UI_trait_strongbackdesc:
Increased carry weight.
(Plus 1-2 carry weight depending on Strength level.)
lang.UI_trait_thickblooddesc:
Wounds bleed less.
(-50% damage from bleeding.)
lang.UI_trait_trapperdesc: (Knows how to make Stick Trap and Wooden Cage Trap.)
lang.UI_trait_usedtocorpsesdesc:
Decaying corpses do not cause nausea.
(If do not have nausea at the moment. Does not affect zombification sickness.)
lang.UI_trait_weakbackdesc:
Reduced carry weight.
(Minus 1-3 carry weight depending on Strength level.)
lang.UI_trait_weathersensitivedesc: May experience headaches when the weather changes and when it rains/snows.
lang.UI_trait_woodaxemybeloveddesc:
Gain additional Axe experience when chopping trees.
Can use Wood Axe more effectively in combat.
(Wood Axe swings faster and cost less endurance.)
